abstract_summ: Coronavirus disease-2019 (COVID-19) is a life-threatening infection caused by the severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus-2 (SARS-CoV-2) virus . Diabetes has rapidly emerged as a major comorbidity for patients with COVID-2019 . We conducted a nationwide multicentre observational study in people with diabetes hospitalised in 53 French centres in the period 10–31 March 2020 .
